title: HOLY SPIRIT, FLOW THROUGH ME
bible_ref: ...But if ye through the spirit do mortify the deeds of the body ye shall live Romans 8:13
verses: Holy Spirit, flow through me,=Holy Spirit, flow through me,=And make my life what it ought to be,=Holy Spirit, flow through me.
Holy Spirit, rest on me,=Holy Spirit, rest on me,=And use me, Lord, win the lost to Thee.=Holy Spirit, rest on me.
Holy Spirit, flow out from me,=Holy Spirit, flow out through me,=Others, Lord, may see You in me,=Holy Spirit, flow out through me.
